name.baseName: modified granulated copper slag production;modified granulated copper slag
改性粒状铜渣生产;改性粒状铜渣

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Modified granulated copper slag (MGCS).MGCS preparation is a crucial phase. The original copper slag was procured from a smelter of Boliden Mineral AB, Stockholm, Sweden. This was ground in the raw mill to form GCS with a particle size lower than 0.60 mm. The CaO (99.9% pure) was supplied by Changsha Danuo Building Materials Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The procedure of MGCS production is as follows. The granulated copper slag (GCS) and CaO (20 wt.%) were charged in the furnace while the heating temperature was raised to approximately 1550 ◦C, at which point the mixtures were completely molten. The water-quenching method was then adopted to form the MGCS. The entire process was carried out within a nitrogen atmosphere with a flow rate of 150 mL/min. This procedure was conducted in the Changsha Research Institute of Mining and Metallurgy Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The produced MGCS was eventually transported by trucks to the cement plant, which uses electricity as the main energy source.

改性粒状铜渣（Modified granulated copper slag，MGCS）。MGCS制备是一个关键的阶段。原始的铜渣是从瑞典斯德哥尔摩的Boliden Mineral AB熔炉采购而来。它在生料磨中被研磨成粒径小于0.60毫米的粒状铜渣（Granulated copper slag，GCS）。CaO（纯度为99.9%）由长沙大诺建材有限公司提供。MGCS的制备过程如下。在加热温度升至约1550℃时，将GCS和CaO（20重量％）装入熔炉中，此时混合物完全熔化。然后采用淬水法形成MGCS。整个过程在氮气环境下进行，流速为150毫升/分钟。这个过程是在长沙矿冶研究院有限公司进行的。生产的MGCS最终被卡车运输到使用电力作为主要能源的水泥工厂。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: A typical cement plant in Changsha, Hunan Province, China
湖南省长沙市内某典型水泥厂

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: MGCS preparation is a crucial phase. The original copper slag was procured from a smelter of Boliden Mineral AB, Stockholm, Sweden. This was ground in the raw mill to form GCS with a particle size lower than 0.60 mm. The CaO (99.9% pure) was supplied by Changsha Danuo Building Materials Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The procedure of MGCS production is as follows. The GCS and CaO (20 wt.%) were charged in the furnace while the heating temperature was raised to approximately 1550 ◦C, at which point the mixtures were completely molten [23]. The water-quenching method was then adopted to form the MGCS. The entire process was carried out within a nitrogen atmosphere with a flow rate of 150 mL/min [24]. This procedure was conducted in the Changsha Research Institute of Mining and Metallurgy Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The produced MGCS was eventually transported by trucks to the cement plant, which uses electricity as the main energy source.

MGCS preparation is a crucial phase. The original copper slag was procured from a smelter of Boliden Mineral AB, Stockholm, Sweden. This was ground in the raw mill to form GCS with a particle size lower than 0.60 mm. The CaO (99.9% pure) was supplied by Changsha Danuo Building Materials Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The procedure of MGCS production is as follows. The GCS and CaO (20 wt.%) were charged in the furnace while the heating temperature was raised to approximately 1550 ◦C, at which point the mixtures were completely molten [23]. The water-quenching method was then adopted to form the MGCS. The entire process was carried out within a nitrogen atmosphere with a flow rate of 150 mL/min [24]. This procedure was conducted in the Changsha Research Institute of Mining and Metallurgy Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The produced MGCS was eventually transported by trucks to the cement plant, which uses electricity as the main energy source.
technology.technologicalApplicability: Modified granulated copper slag (MGCS) is primarily utilized in the construction industry as a supplementary cementitious material, due to its pozzolanic properties. This material can be incorporated into cement production to enhance certain properties of the resulting concrete, such as increased durability and reduced permeability. MGCS is also valuable in applications where sustainability is a focus, as it repurposes a byproduct from the metal smelting industry and can potentially reduce carbon emissions associated with cement manufacturing.
改性粒状铜渣（MGCS）主要用于建筑业，作为一种补充性胶凝材料，因其具有火山灰活性特性。该材料可以被纳入水泥生产中，以增强其混凝土的某些性能，例如提高耐久性和减小渗透性。MGCS在可持续性成为重点的应用中也很有价值，因为它重新利用了金属冶炼业的副产品，并且可能降低水泥制造过程中相关的碳排放。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: A functional unit (FU) is defined as 1 kg of mixed cement with a compressive strength of 42.9 MPa.
功能单位（FU）被定义为具有42.9 MPa抗压强度的1千克混合水泥。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: Some data related to the background system were obtained from the Ecoinvent 3.1 database.
与背景系统相关的数据从Ecoinvent 3.1数据库中获得。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Inventory data for the Prospect system is collected directly from cement plants located in Changsha, Hunan Province, China.
前景系统的清单数据是直接从位于中国湖南省长沙市的水泥厂收集的。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Qinli Zhang, Bingyi Zhang, & Daolin Wang. (2022). Environmental Benefit Assessment of Blended Cement with Modified Granulated Copper Slag. MATERIALS, 15(15).
Qinli Zhang, Bingyi Zhang, & Daolin Wang. (2022). Environmental Benefit Assessment of Blended Cement with Modified Granulated Copper Slag. MATERIALS, 15(15).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this dataset for life cycle assessment or similar purposes, it is critical to ensure that the impact of the origin copper slag preparation is excluded, as per EU directives which consider copper slag to be a waste product with no allocated environmental burden. Focus should be given to the environmental impacts incurred during the grinding and modification processes of granulated copper slag (GCS). Additionally, users should verify that any energy consumption data and transport emissions encapsulate the complete supply chain from the raw material procurement to the delivery of MGCS to the cement plant.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估或类似用途时，关键要确保根据欧盟指令排除铜渣来源准备的影响，认为铜渣是一种无需分配环境负担的废弃产品。应专注于粒状铜渣（GCS）研磨和改性过程中产生的环境影响。另外，用户应验证任何能耗数据和运输排放都包含了从原料采购到MGCS交付到水泥厂的完整供应链。

completeness.common:other: The impact of the origin copper slag preparation was not considered in this study since it can be regarded as a waste product and is allocated no environmental burden according to EU directives . Accordingly, only impacts incurred during the grinding and modification of granulated copper slag (GCS) will be taken into account.
由于铜渣可以被视为废物并根据欧盟指令不分配任何环境负担，因此本研究未考虑铜渣来源准备的影响。因此，只考虑了对粒状铜渣研磨和改性过程中产生的影响。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: PM. The particle size is not specified. Here we treat it as PM>10.
